verses.verse: And Dinah <WH1783> the daughter <WH1323> of Leah, <WH3812> which <WH834> she bore <WH3205> unto Jacob, <WH3290> went out <WH3318> to see <WH7200> the daughters <WH1323> of the land. <WH776>

And when Shechem <WH7928> the son <WH1121> of Hamor <WH2544> the Hivite, <WH2340> prince <WH5387> of the country, <WH776> saw <WH7200> her, he took <WH3947> her, and lay with <WH7901> her, and defiled <WH6031> her.

And his soul <WH5315> cleaved <WH1692> unto Dinah <WH1783> the daughter <WH1323> of Jacob, <WH3290> and he loved <WH157> <WH853> the damsel, <WH5291> and spoke <WH1696> kindly <WH5921> <WH3820> unto the damsel. <WH5291>
And Shechem <WH7928> spoke <WH559> unto <WH413> his father <WH1> Hamor, <WH2544> saying, <WH559> Get <WH3947> me <WH853> this <WH2063> damsel <WH3207> to wife. <WH802>

And Jacob <WH3290> heard <WH8085> that <WH3588> he had defiled <WH2930> <WH853> Dinah <WH1783> his daughter: <WH1323> now his sons <WH1121> were <WH1961> with <WH854> his cattle <WH4735> in the field: <WH7704> and Jacob <WH3290> held his peace <WH2790> until <WH5704> they were come. <WH935>
And Hamor <WH2544> the father <WH1> of Shechem <WH7927> went out <WH3318> unto <WH413> Jacob <WH3290> to commune <WH1696> with <WH854> him.

And the sons <WH1121> of Jacob <WH3290> came <WH935> out of <WH4480> the field <WH7704> when they heard <WH8085> it: and the men <WH376> were grieved, <WH6087> and they were very wroth, <WH2734> <WH3966> because <WH3588> he had wrought <WH6213> folly <WH5039> in Israel <WH3478> in lying with <WH7901> <WH853> Jacob's <WH3290> daughter; <WH1323> which thing <WH3651> ought not <WH3808> to be done. <WH6213>

And Hamor <WH2544> communed <WH1696> with <WH854> them, saying, <WH559> The soul <WH5315> of my son <WH1121> Shechem <WH7928> longeth <WH2836> for your daughter: <WH1323> I pray you <WH4994> give <WH5414> her him to wife. <WH802>
And make ye marriages <WH2859> with <WH854> us, and give <WH5414> your daughters <WH1323> unto us, and take <WH3947> our daughters <WH1323> unto you.
And ye shall dwell <WH3427> with <WH854> us: and the land <WH776> shall be <WH1961> before <WH6440> you; dwell <WH3427> and trade <WH5503> ye therein, and get you possessions <WH270> therein.

And Shechem <WH7928> said <WH559> unto <WH413> her father <WH1> and unto <WH413> her brethren, <WH251> Let me find <WH4672> grace <WH2580> in your eyes, <WH5869> and what <WH834> ye shall say <WH559> unto <WH413> me I will give. <WH5414>

Ask <WH7235> <WH5921> me never so much <WH3966> dowry <WH4119> and gift, <WH4976> and I will give <WH5414> according as <WH834> ye shall say <WH559> unto <WH413> me: but give <WH5414> me <WH853> the damsel <WH5291> to wife. <WH802>

And the sons <WH1121> of Jacob <WH3290> answered <WH6030> <WH853> Shechem <WH7928> and Hamor <WH2544> his father <WH1> deceitfully, <WH4820> and said, <WH1696> because <WH834> he had defiled <WH2930> <WH853> Dinah <WH1783> their sister: <WH269>

And they said <WH559> unto <WH413> them, We cannot <WH3808> <WH3201> do <WH6213> this <WH2088> thing, <WH1697> to give <WH5414> <WH853> our sister <WH269> to one <WH376> that <WH834> is uncircumcised; <WH6190> for <WH3588> that <WH1931> were a reproach <WH2781> unto us:
But <WH389> in this <WH2063> will we consent <WH225> unto you: If <WH518> ye will be <WH1961> as we be, that every <WH3605> male <WH2145> of you be circumcised; <WH4135>

Then will we give <WH5414> <WH853> our daughters <WH1323> unto you, and we will take <WH3947> your daughters <WH1323> to us, and we will dwell <WH3427> with <WH854> you, and we will become <WH1961> one <WH259> people. <WH5971>
But if <WH518> ye will not <WH3808> hearken <WH8085> unto <WH413> us, to be circumcised; <WH4135> then will we take <WH3947> <WH853> our daughter, <WH1323> and we will be gone. <WH1980>
And their words <WH1697> pleased <WH3190> <WH5869> Hamor, <WH2544> and Shechem <WH7928> Hamor's <WH2544> son. <WH1121>

And the young man <WH5288> deferred <WH309> not <WH3808> to do <WH6213> the thing, <WH1697> because <WH3588> he had delight <WH2654> in Jacob's <WH3290> daughter: <WH1323> and he <WH1931> was more honorable <WH3513> than all <WH4480> <WH3605> the house <WH1004> of his father. <WH1>

And Hamor <WH2544> and Shechem <WH7928> his son <WH1121> came <WH935> unto <WH413> the gate <WH8179> of their city, <WH5892> and communed <WH1696> with <WH413> the men <WH376> of their city, <WH5892> saying, <WH559>

These <WH428> men <WH376> are peaceable <WH8003> with <WH854> us; therefore let them dwell <WH3427> in the land, <WH776> and trade <WH5503> therein; for the land, <WH776> behold, <WH2009> it is large enough <WH7342> <WH3027> for <WH6440> them; let us take <WH3947> <WH853> their daughters <WH1323> to us for wives, <WH802> and let us give <WH5414> them our daughters. <WH1323>

Only <WH389> herein <WH2063> will the men <WH376> consent <WH225> unto us for to dwell <WH3427> with <WH854> us, to be <WH1961> one <WH259> people, <WH5971> if every <WH3605> male <WH2145> among us be circumcised, <WH4135> as <WH834> they <WH1992> are circumcised. <WH4135>

Shall not <WH3808> their cattle <WH4735> and their substance <WH7075> and every <WH3605> beast <WH929> of theirs be ours? only <WH389> let us consent <WH225> unto them, and they will dwell <WH3427> with <WH854> us.

And unto <WH413> Hamor <WH2544> and unto <WH413> Shechem <WH7928> his son <WH1121> hearkened <WH8085> all <WH3605> that went out <WH3318> of the gate <WH8179> of his city; <WH5892> and every <WH3605> male <WH2145> was circumcised, <WH4135> all <WH3605> that went out <WH3318> of the gate <WH8179> of his city. <WH5892>

And it came to pass <WH1961> on the third <WH7992> day, <WH3117> when they were <WH1961> sore, <WH3510> that two <WH8147> of the sons <WH1121> of Jacob, <WH3290> Simeon <WH8095> and Levi, <WH3878> Dinah's <WH1783> brethren, <WH251> took <WH3947> each man <WH376> his sword, <WH2719> and came <WH935> upon <WH5921> the city <WH5892> boldly, <WH983> and slew <WH2026> all <WH3605> the males. <WH2145>

And they slew <WH2026> Hamor <WH2544> and Shechem <WH7928> his son <WH1121> with the edge <WH6310> of the sword, <WH2719> and took <WH3947> <WH853> Dinah <WH1783> out of Shechem's <WH7928> house, <WH4480> <WH1004> and went out. <WH3318>
The sons <WH1121> of Jacob <WH3290> came <WH935> upon <WH5921> the slain, <WH2491> and spoiled <WH962> the city, <WH5892> because <WH834> they had defiled <WH2930> their sister. <WH269>
They took <WH3947> <WH853> their sheep, <WH6629> and their oxen, <WH1241> and their asses, <WH2543> and that which <WH834> was in the city, <WH5892> and that which <WH834> was in the field, <WH7704>

And all <WH3605> their wealth, <WH2428> and all <WH3605> their little ones, <WH2945> and their wives <WH802> took they captive, <WH7617> and spoiled <WH962> even all <WH3605> that <WH834> was in the house. <WH1004>

And Jacob <WH3290> said <WH559> to <WH413> Simeon <WH8095> and Levi, <WH3878> Ye have troubled <WH5916> me to make me to stink <WH887> among the inhabitants <WH3427> of the land, <WH776> among the Canaanites <WH3669> and the Perizzites: <WH6522> and I <WH589> being few <WH4962> in number, <WH4557> they shall gather themselves together <WH622> against <WH5921> me, and slay <WH5221> me; and I shall be destroyed, <WH8045> I <WH589> and my house. <WH1004>
And they said, <WH559> Should he deal with <WH6213> <WH853> our sister <WH269> as with an harlot? <WH2181>
